summary: Renames some of the Dragonborn added items for better sorting.
descriptionHtml:
Did this for myself, and figured others may find it useful.

*Update* This mod may not be needed, Enhanced Better Sorting now has Dragonborn Support.
But if you are running an old version, or perhaps another sorting mod, this should still work fine.

This alters the name of various items to follow the the sorting naming style in Better Sorting by eclips3 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26558).
(Mod not required)

Examples:
Arrow - Nordic
Ore - Stalhrim
Dragon Claw - Amethyst, Left Half
Spider - Poison Cloaked

This may work with other sorting mods, but untested. 
I\'m sure there are some additional items to rename, I just did the ones that stood out to me.

Tools:
Construction Kit
author: ViperLord
